title: [BUG] XPS creation silently fails on Linux
body:
**Description**

Creation of an XPS document fails on Linux with no exception.  Just a null result.
Works fine on windows.

**Code**

`            var outputStream = File.Create("./xpstest.xps");
            var managedStream = new SKManagedWStream(outputStream);
            var document = SKDocument.CreateXps(managedStream);
`

**Expected Behavior**

Document should not be null or an exception raised.

**Actual Behavior**

Document is null.

**Basic Information**

netcoreapp3.1

- Version with issue:  1.68.2.1
- Last known good version:  ??
- IDE:  Visual Studio Code 
- Platform Target Frameworks:  
  - Linux:  Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
  - Windows Classic:  Windows 7+
- Target Devices:   <!-- the devices that you noticed this on, e.g. iPhone X -->


**Screenshots**

<!-- if the issue is a visual issue, please include screenshots showing the problem if possible -->

**Reproduction Link**

https://gist.github.com/Jonesie/0ce0e93d541c92516429fa205fc6319b
